newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech Vertex first half profit rises.
newsitem.headline: Czech Vertex first half profit rises.

text.p: Results for six months ending June 30, 1997, according to Czech accounting standards (in millions of crowns):

NOTE. Full company name is Vertex a.s.. The firm is a leading Czech glass fibres maker and exporter. Its shares are traded on the main market of the Prague Stock Exchange. Results were provided by the company.
